whatIsAcne.title: What Is Acne?
whatIsAcne.content:
Acne is a common skin condition that occurs when hair follicles become clogged with oil, dead skin cells, and bacteria. It can appear as blackheads, whiteheads, pimples, or deeper cysts, primarily affecting the face, chest, back, and shoulders.

At The Skin Firm, our dermatologist-led acne treatments are designed to address the root causes of acne, not just the symptoms. We create personalized treatment plans that target active breakouts while preventing future ones, helping you achieve clear, healthy skin.

items: Blackheads and whiteheads on face, chest, or back

faqs.title: FAQs on Acne Treatment in Pune

questions.question: How soon will I see results from the acne treatment?
questions.answer: Most clients notice visible improvement within 2–4 sessions, depending on acne severity and skin type. For enduring results, maintaining a long-term regimen is essential.

questions.question: Is this treatment suitable for hormonal or adult acne?
questions.answer: Yes. Our protocol is effective across all acne types, including hormonal, cystic, and adult-onset acne. The treatment is customised after a thorough skin evaluation.

questions.question: Can acne-prone, sensitive skin tolerate these procedures?
questions.answer: Absolutely. We carefully select our ingredients and modalities, ensuring they're effective yet non-irritating. Sensitive skin types are treated with additional attention.

questions.question: Will this help with acne scars, too?
questions.answer: While this treatment primarily focuses on active acne, we also provide additional procedures like microneedling or laser resurfacing specifically for acne scars, which can be integrated into your plan.

questions.question: How often should I get the treatment done?
questions.answer: Typically, sessions are spaced 2–4 weeks apart. Your dermatologist will create a schedule based on your skin's needs.
